description:
reflect.DeepEqual: document that empty and nil are unequal for slices

Update issue 4133.
Added a sentence of documentation to call out the behavior.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On Wed, Sep 26, 2012 at 7:01 PM, roger peppe <rogpeppe@gmail.com> wrote:

>> +// Unlike regular ==, however, it distinguishes an empty slice from a nil
>> slice.
>
> i'm not sure what you mean there. you can't compare slices with regular ==,
> unless it's to nil, in which case an empty slice is definitely
> distinguished from
> a nil slice.
>
> perhaps just "An empty slice compares unequal to a nil slice" might do.

Hmm, good point.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=bb1ad0db059a ***

reflect.DeepEqual: document that empty and nil are unequal for slices

Update issue 4133.
Added a sentence of documentation to call out the behavior.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6572051

> +// Unlike regular ==, however, it distinguishes an empty slice from a nil
> slice.

i'm not sure what you mean there. you can't compare slices with regular ==,
unless it's to nil, in which case an empty slice is definitely
distinguished from
a nil slice.

perhaps just "An empty slice compares unequal to a nil slice" might do.

subject: code review 6572051: reflect.DeepEqual: document that empty and nil are uneq...
